# Government Tender Announcement
## FFCP SRV 3.3 Senior Project Leader

### Project Overview

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for a Senior Project Leader/Executive to support the Future Fighter Capability Project (FFCP) Sustainment Management section in the execution of project management activities.

### Requirements

* The contractor shall provide a Senior Project Leader/Executive with expertise in project planning, scheduling, risk management, and requirements management.
* The contractor must be a Supply Arrangement Holder under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 and under the stated consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise.
* The proposed contract duration is from February 1, 2024, to January 31, 2029.
* The estimated level of effort is 1,300 days.

### Eligibility

This tender is open to Supply Arrangement Holders who have been invited to submit a proposal. The following companies have been invited:
- Accenture Inc.
- ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
- CGI Information Systems and Management Consultants Inc.
- Fujitsu Consulting (CANADA) Inc./Fujitsu Conseil (Canada) Inc.
- HubSpoke Inc.
- IPSS INC.
- MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
- Mindwire Systems Ltd.
- Promaxis Systems Inc
- Quallium Corporation
- Randstad Interim Inc.
- RealIT Management Inc.
- The AIM Group Inc.
- Valcom Consulting group Inc.
- Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

### Security Clearance

* Company minimum security level: Top Secret
* Resource minimum security level: Top Secret
* Document safeguarding security level: N/A
